text: James Efmorfidis (; born 18 January 1996 in Athens) is a Greek professional footballer who plays as an attacking midfielder for Eredivisie club RKC Waalwijk. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|OtherIncludes Eredivisie promotion play-offs !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="3"|Jong AZ |2015–16 |Beloften Eredivisie |19||2||colspan="4"|—||19||2 |- |2016–17 |Tweede Divisie |7||1||colspan="4"|—||7||1 |- !colspan="2"|Total !26!!3!!colspan="4"|—!!26!!3 |- |rowspan="2"|AEL |2016–17 |Superleague |2||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||2||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !2!!0!!0!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!2!!0 |- |rowspan="3"|Jong Almere City |2017–18 |Derde Divisie |16||4||colspan="4"|—||16||4 |- |2018–19 |Tweede Divisie |1||0||colspan="4"|—||1||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !17||4||colspan="4"|—||17||4 |- |rowspan="3"|Almere City |2018–19 |rowspan="2"|Eerste Divisie |35||9||1||0||2 |0||38||9 |- |2019–20 |15||4||1||1||0||0||16||5 |- !colspan="2"|Total !50!!13!!2!!1!!2!!0!!54!!14 |- | rowspan="2" |RKC Waalwijk |2020–21 |Eredivisie |3 |0 |0 |0 | colspan="2" |— |3 |0 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !3 !0 !0 !0 ! colspan="2" |— !3 !0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !98!!21!!2!!1!!2!!0!!102!!22 |} ==References== ==External links== * *totaldutchfootball.com *arenalarissa.gr *sportlarissa.gr * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Athens Category:Greek footballers Category:Greece youth international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:AE Larissa FC players Category:Almere City FC players Category:Eerste Divisie players Category:Tweede Divisie players Category:Derde Divisie players
